vtopoclass.c File Reference

vtopoclass - topological classification. More...

Detailed Description

vtopoclass - topological classification.

Description
Each foreground voxel of a 3D binary input image receives a label indicating its topological type. Possible types are the following:
Output codes:
  • 1: interior point
  • 2: isolated point
  • 3: border point
  • 4: curve point
  • 5: curves junction
  • 6: surface point
  • 7: surface/curve junction
  • 8: surfaces junction
  • 9: surfaces/curve junction
Reference
G. Malandain, G. Bertrand, N. Ayache: "Topological Segmentation of discrete surfaces", Intern. Journal of Computer Vision, 10:2, pp. 183-197, 1993
Usage
vtopoclass
Parameters:
-in  input image
-out  output image
Examples

Known bugs
none.

G.Lohmann, MPI-CBS, 2004
